This game!!! It graps you and doesn't let go like the Clot you are fighting. It has it's own beauty in that you don't have that pesky cross-hair and it is worth playing on harder difficulty as it becomes extremely challenging. If you manage to get a good team combination this game is even more fun! It is sort of love or hate relationship for lot of people but to me this game is amazing and most fun with friends to just run around, shoot, scream that you're getting raped by a Fleshpound and require assistence. One of the best survival horrors I ever played.

9/10
This game has quickly become one of my favorite games ever. In the past two weeks alone, I've played an astonishing 125 hours (averaging at about 9 hours a day). That tells you two things: A) I have no life, and B) this game is amazing.
It's a simple, yet thought-provoking concept and it's not really a "story" type of game (though there is an objective mode if you'd be interested in that), meaning, you can play for tons and tons of hours and never really have won.
One of the best parts is the community. I've never encountered a game where the community is SO awesome. Sure, you get the jerks every now and then, but most people are friendly, helpful, and in every other way incredible.
If you have any doubts about this game being worth the price, let me put them to rest, this game is AMAZING!

This game shouldn't even need a recommendation; it's simply something that should be on any first-person shooter player's list.
Rock-solid gunplay, a good variety of enemies, a trend of teamwork without insta-gibbing lone wolves, and moddable support makes this a zombie shooter that's easily on-par with L4D2. With admittedly aging graphics and not as much depth in the non-modded game, it does have to be let out that this game isn't for every single person playing computer games out there, but the minor flaws in Killing Floor are completely covered up by everything they got right, and the continued developer support (as of the start of 2014) acts as the unneeded icing on the cake.

Take that, crappy ios games, HA!

The graphics aren't Crysis. The sound isn't Alien Versus Predator. The shooting is not Counter-Strike. Lots of monsters... kill them, get paid, buy guns, kill more, get paid, buy bigger guns, etc. You can even do it with your friends. Oh... and there is no crosshair. So what is there to like? The game is dark, the monsters are a pain in the ass, the theme is rolled out well, a few good classes to play, many maps, there are TONS of achievements... and it is A LOT OF FUN TO PLAY! If you like co-op survival horror shooters... this is it! +1 just because I am still playing it and for the leveling system that is hard, but well worth it (and you get to keep the level you reach instead of losing it after every game, thats why it is so hard to level).

Прикольная игра советую поиграть с друзьями и скайпом.Но есть минус если хочешь больше скинов и оружия в магазинах то придётся данатить я задонатил и не жилею.Игра стоит не дёшево 300 рублей.Советую купить.Эту игру можно обсуждать бесконечно.Я сам самневался при покупки посмотрел каментарии все положительные кроме двух челов один играл в эту игру аж 2768 часов и там почти все играли столько же.Такчто советую купить Killing Floor.Игра жестокоя.Против зомби их там всяких разных куча короче.Killing Floor шутер от 1-го лица.Есть там и професии и их можно качать.Кач даёт скидки на пушки    смотря какая професия я огнемётчик он самый домажный я с огемёта завалил босса за 10сек он даже не успел мне нечто зделать если не верите посматрите в достижениях там оно есть.
Great game. A whole different experience than L4D2. Zombies with chainsaws and guns, add a dark map and you have Killing Floor. Definitely worth the money.
love the game

Ottimo gioco unisce ad un gameplay accattivante una vasta gamma di armi e scenari oltre ad innumerevoli fan mods che permettono di modificare il gioco in quasi ogni suo aspetto rendendo le partite sempre diverse.
This has got to be...THE FUNNEST ZOMBIE SURIVAL GAME I"VE EVER PLAYED LITERALLY! I can literally not get bored of this game. I just wish I had a better computer to play it on XD

Mostly now only modded servers and plenty of "pro" (eye roll) players to grief you, but by itself it's a great zombie shooter.

If you enjoyed the co-op experience of L4D you will enjoy this. Wave based PVE with a final boss, in a static map, so no moving through areas or anything like that (however patrolling and staying mobile is the most viable way to live). 

Quite a bit more difficult than L4D on highest difficulty, it provides a solid challenge and different style of play.

Probably less co-op focused than L4D, as there really aren't any CC mechanics other players need to help you from. Just straight up HP based combat with rounds.

Good stuff.
